Reviews.Title: Kodak's digital camera rocks!!
Reviews.Author: Jennifer H
Reviews.Content: I wanted to give this camera a 5 star rating because it is overall a great camera. It has great quality pictures, easy to use.  It was a little confusing trying to figure out how to recall the pictures, but that didn't take long. I definitely recommend buying this camera or brand.

Reviews.Title: Kodak easy share M531 camera
Reviews.Author: Sheryl J. Hesser
Reviews.Content: This camera will not take unblurred pictures or should I say hazy pictures.  It's terrible, especially with indoor pictures.  I have an older version of Kodak easy share and it was a great camera compared to this one.  Don't get it.

Reviews.Title: So Kodak
Reviews.Author: Arelis Santana "*-Koda-*"
Reviews.Content: This camera is so cool! the best! comfortable and take awesome pictures ;) you better get one of this! the zoom and lens works perfect and with a memory card you can take a lot of memories that you are going to treasure.

Reviews.Title: Happy with the Camera
Reviews.Author: Dave Kinsella "Jesus First"
Reviews.Content: Very nice camera. Compact. Fairly lightweight. Good quality photos.I haven't used the easy share button and probably won't. My personal feeling is it's a bit of a gimmick.A nice touch is when you finish saving your photos onto your computer it asks if you want to delete them from your camera. My old one didn't do that.The video images come out really crisp and clear compared to my old camera.A really nice thing about this camera and the reason I bought it was that it has a rechargeable battery. My last camera needed two AA batteries each time and it went through them pretty quickly.This camera is nicely priced and will save you money if you are currently using one that requires disposable batteries.Just don't loose it down at the beach like my wife did! We never got it back, and my reason for coming on Amazon was to price another one!!!

Reviews.Title: GREAT!
Reviews.Author: B. H. Haney
Reviews.Content: This is my 4th Kodak camera and by far my favorite! I have owned this one for about 6 months. Picture quality is amazing and super easy to use! I have had NO problems with it and I take pictures everyday of my 2 small children. Great Buy!

Reviews.Title: Bad battery - bad customer service Kodak!
Reviews.Author: R. Hill "Rwh138"
Reviews.Content: My brand new M531 camera does not hold a charge, I called Kodak, I was on hold for 30 minutes before I spoke to someone. They want me to write a letter, send them a copy of the receipt and the battery in order to get a replacement battery. Talk about making the customer experience enjoyable, NOT! Thank you Kodak, I will never buy from you again!

Reviews.Title: Smart Camera
Reviews.Author: Michael Perez Russell
Reviews.Content: Easy 2 Operate Very Easy 2 Download Pictures & Movies 2 Your Computer / Laptop.Absolutely A Smart Camera.As It Says It Is An EasyShare Camera

Reviews.Title: Kodakcamera
Reviews.Author: Ruby Myrvold
Reviews.Content: This camera was exactly what was described and I was expecting..It works perfect! Ive used Kodak for years and will continue to do so.

14.5 Megapixels
2.7" Indoor/Outdoor Color Display

ProductInfo.Name: Kodak EasyShare M531 14MP 3x Optical/5x Digital Zoom HD Camera (Red/Black) - One Touch Sharing!
